content: I am trying to implement go microservices that use IBM/FHIR database. I have a question, what is stored in the data column? Is it encrypted data? If so how can we decrypt it? Can someone please help me implement a function that reads the data from the resources tables?
@keshav Bist I think you put your question in the wrong stream. Inferno stream is for discussion about ONC (g)(10) testing procedure.
